title: Extreme Brewing - Deluxe Edition by Sam Calagione
description:
Extreme Brewing - Deluxe Edition

By Sam Calagione owner of Dogfish Head Craft Brewery

An enthusiast's guide to brewing craft beer at home.  

This enthusiast's guide to homebrewing now features 14 new recipes from world-class craft breweries in this deluxe edition. This guide also covers cooking with beer, beer pairings, and step-by-step instructions that will expand the definition of great beer.
